text: Hi. I noticed Critical Bugs several times on Design manager
I was working on style.css on design manager, and made lots of changes

And I closed that browser tab, and after few hours , open it again.
But it doesn't have all my works. I noticed that after I saved and publish file.
This makes me work again.
I think this need to be fixed asap
are you using a tracking blocker like Ghostery or Adblock?Those extensions can sometimes interfere with HubSpot. I have seen weird bugs that where resolved with turning those extension off
Try looking at the revision history for the css sheet. Sometimes if you have multiple tabs open on the same file it can effect the version that you are seeing.
